snippet: ZIMMERMAN--Gloria. (nee Goldenberg) age 86 of Fort Lee on March 18, 2016. Beloved wife of Morton, mother of Ilise Zimmerman Posen (Dennis) and Richard Zimmerman (Faith.) Devoted grandmother of Stephanie and Michelle Posen and Natalie Zimmerman. Loving sister of Arthur Goldenberg (Karen) and aunt of Cookie London (Arnie.) Amazing piano teacher and friend. Services "Eden Memorial Chapels" 327 Main Street, Fort Lee, NJ Sunday, 10:00am. 201-947-3336 1/3
